nerdctl build --build-arg=kube_version=v1.30.4 --tag=image-prefix/cluster:staging-prefix-<VERSION>-k8s.v1.30.4 --platform=linux/<ARCH> -f ./images/cluster/Dockerfile .
nerdctl push --platform=linux/<ARCH> image-prefix/cluster:staging-prefix-<VERSION>-k8s.v1.30.4
nerdctl build --build-arg=kube_version=v1.29.8 --tag=image-prefix/cluster:staging-prefix-<VERSION>-k8s.v1.29.8 --platform=linux/<ARCH> -f ./images/cluster/Dockerfile .
nerdctl push --platform=linux/<ARCH> image-prefix/cluster:staging-prefix-<VERSION>-k8s.v1.29.8
nerdctl build --build-arg=kube_version=v1.28.13 --tag=image-prefix/cluster:staging-prefix-<VERSION>-k8s.v1.28.13 --platform=linux/<ARCH> -f ./images/cluster/Dockerfile .
nerdctl push --platform=linux/<ARCH> image-prefix/cluster:staging-prefix-<VERSION>-k8s.v1.28.13
